name: Orc
description: Orcs are hardy, powerful people who trace their creation to Gruumsh. They are known for their endurance and ferocity.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Adrenaline Rush
features.description: You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action, gaining Temporary Hit Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus. Uses: Proficiency Bonus per Short or Long Rest.

features.name: Relentless Endurance
features.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once per Long Rest.
